Html:
Hi, I was wondering if it is possible to port GMap.NET in order to use it in XNA?

Greetings
everything is possible, do you have faith to accomplish it, is the only question ;}

mmm well yes, I have faith, but I need to know something first, from you point of view, is it difficult or easy?, I told you that because your project is huge and  I don't even know how it works. I need to port GMap.NET to XNA for a school project and I only have two months to finish it.

Thats why I have many doubts to port it.

Greetings
well the only part that is changing, is rendering, so if you know how to render simple picture, should be easy to adapt it

Just wondering if jaquense or anybody has made an attempt to do the rendering on XNA as I am also quite interested to have this work on XNA.

Thanks
so far all faith has disappeared into smoke ;}

LOL radioman, no, I didn't do the port. I though it was a waste of time for a Microsoft Technology

 

Best Regards,
